title: What Apple Is Hinting At With Its March 8 Event's 'Peek Performance' Tagline
summary: Apple confirmed Wednesday that its  first hardware launch event of the year will be held on March 8. The event goes by the tagline "Peek Performance" and is being held virtually yet again.

title: If You Invested $100 In Apple When Steve Jobs Stepped Down As CEO In 2011, Here's How Much You'd Have Now
summary: Investors who placed their cash into major U.S. indices have enjoyed respectable returns since summer 2011.

title: CNBC's Final Trades: Palo Alto Networks, CSX And More
summary: On CNBC’s “Halftime Report Final Trades,” Bryn Talkington of Requisite Capital Management chose SPDR S&P Oil & Gas Exploration & Production ETF (NYSEARCA: XOP) as her pick.

title: Over $4 A Gallon: Gas Prices Surge To Highest Levels In Over A Decade
summary: Gas prices in the U.S. have reached their highest levels since 2008 as the Russian war in Ukraine is being felt by Americans at the pump.

title: Why This Tesla Analyst Thinks Giga Berlin Is A 'Major Competitive Advantage' For The EV Maker
summary: Tesla, Inc.'s (NASDAQ: TSLA) Giga Berlin received approval for commencing operations late last week.

title: Why Tesla And This Automaker Are 'Shelter In Inflationary Storm'
summary:
The outlook for companies and stocks are mired by numerous uncertainties that are currently at play. Even as investors remained dithery over how the Fed's monetary policy normalization could impact their top- and bottom-lines, the Ukrainian crisis came as an added shock.

An analyst at Morgan Stanley has a couple recommendation for these trying times.

title: Elon Musk Tells President Zelensky He 'Looks Forward' To Visiting Ukraine
summary: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) CEO Elon Musk says he looks forward to visiting Ukraine, presumably after the war is over.

title: Netflix Becomes Nyetflix, Shutting Down Russian Service To Protest Ukraine Invasion
summary: Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX) has become the latest U.S. entertainment company to halt its operations in Russia to protest the country’s invasion of Ukraine.

title: 'The Batman' Reigns At US Box Office With $120M Opening Weekend
summary: “The Batman” overwhelmed the U.S. box office this weekend, ratcheting up $128.5 million in ticket sales from 4,417 screens.

title: Russian Banks Switch To China's UnionPay After Mastercard And Visa Suspend Operations
summary: Russian banks suspended from operating on Mastercard’s (NYSE: MA) and Visa’s (NYSE: V) card payments networks are switching their business to the rival Chinese system UnionPay.
